history.proof: qsimpl time: 2 use: PropositionalStable. qsimpl time: 2 use: MonoPred_stableSM,PropositionalStable. qsimpl time: 2 use: MonoPred_stableSM,Bisimulation,PropositionalStable. qsimpl time: 2 use: MonoPred_stableSM,Bisimulation,PropositionalStable. qsimpl time: 2 use: MonoPred_stableSM,Bisimulation,PropositionalStable.

exceptions.exn: Cannot coerce PropositionalStable to an evaluable reference.
Cannot coerce Bisimulation to an evaluable reference.
The reference R1_bis was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: specialize (bis_l L minL pL x y Hx).
exceptions.exn: The reference Hx was not found in the current environment.

exceptions.tactic: specialize (bis_r L minL pL x y Hy).
exceptions.exn: The reference Hy was not found in the current environment.
Unable to find an instance for the variables m, n, m'.
Unable to find an instance for the variables m, n, n'.
The reference n' was not found in the current environment.

original: unfold PropositionalStable. intros L minL pL mL. intros x y Hx Hy. unfold MonoPred_stableSM in pL. unfold Bisimulation in R1_bis. destruct R1_bis as [bis_l bis_r]. specialize (bis_l L minL pL x y Hx). specialize (bis_r L minL pL x y Hy). destruct bis_l as [m' [Rm' [nm' bis_m']]]. destruct bis_r as [n' [Rn' [yn' bis_n']]]. exists n'. split. auto. auto.
